popup_auto_attendance_description.message: A new tab will open at the end of the meeting, showing the results

donate_paragraph1.message: Your donation helps pay for the continued development of this app that is used by thousands of people every day for free, anywhere in the world.

donate_paragraph2.message: This wouldn't exist without your help and support. Thank you!

options_meeting_modal_description.message: The attendee list for $NAME$ from $DATE$. You can download a copy of the report in CSV format.

options_delete_modal_description.message: Warning! This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete meeting $NAME$ from $DATE$?

options_delete_all_modal_description.message: Warning! This action cannot be undone. You will lose all of the meetings saved so far. Are you sure you want to delete all meetings history?

options_edit_modal_description.message: Changes to the meeting name will be reflected across the meetings history table and in the downloaded files.

updates_consider_supporting.message: Consider supporting us in one of the two ways

updates_rate_description.message: Please take a moment and help spread the word by rating Google Meet Attendance List. It's quick and free!

updates_donate_description.message: Your donation helps pay for the continued development of this app that is used by thousands of people every day for free.
